descriptionHtml:
##
######################
##BrelynaFaceliftArclite##
######################
##v0.9
##
_________________________________________________

[Description]
Simple facelift mod for Brelyna. It was originally meant to have a custom body and texture, but I lowered the scope of the project in favor for more compatibility.

[Requirements]
ApachiiHairsFemale
RaceCompatibility
Latest version of skyrim

[Install]
Extract files into skyrim data folder.

[Uninstall]
go to...

>data>Meshes>Actors>Character>FaceGenData>FaceGeom>Skyrim.esm
>delete: 0001C196.NIF

>data>Textures>Actors>Character>FaceGenData>FaceGeom>Skyrim.esm
>delete: 0001C196.dds, 0001C196.tga

>data
>delete: BrelynaFaceliftArclite.esp

[QA]
>What textures did you use in your pictures?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?
Using nuska diffuse map with navetsea normals.

>What enb are you using?
Plain old 0.254 with The Wilds 119's enbpalette.
author: Spezzy
